mapper.select: select (select count(*) from rd_admin.tb_req_special_dj redj) as requestDal , (select count(*) from rd_admin.tb_special_dj dj) as approveDal
mapper.sql: select dj.idx as idx , dj.mem_no as mem_no , dj.title as title , dj.reg_date as reg_date , dj.contents as contents , dj.state as state , dj.op_name as op_name , dj.last_upd_date as last_upd_date , profile.specialdj_badge as specialdj_badge , @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 as rowNum from rd_admin.tb_req_special_dj dj , rd_data.tb_member_profile profile , (select @RNUM := 0) r where profile.mem_no = dj.mem_no order by idx desc
mapper.select: /* Men_Special.xml - getReqSpecialDetail */ select idx ,mem_no , title , reg_date , op_name , last_upd_date , contents , state from rd_admin.tb_req_special_dj where idx = #{idx}
mapper.insert: /* Men_Special.xml - reqOk */ insert into rd_admin.tb_special_dj (req_idx, mem_no, reg_date, op_name, `order`) values (#{idx}, #{mem_no}, current_timestamp(), #{op_name}, (select ifnull(max(`order`), 0 ) + 1 from rd_admin.tb_special_dj dj))
mapper.sql: select req_idx , mem_no , reg_date , is_force , `order` , op_name , @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 as rowNum from rd_admin.tb_special_dj , (select @RNUM := 0) r order by `order` asc, reg_date desc
mapper.select: /* Men_Special.xml - getSpecialDetail */ select dj.req_idx , dj.mem_no , dj.reg_date , dj.is_force , dj.op_name , redj.title , redj.contents from rd_admin.tb_special_dj dj , rd_admin.tb_req_special_dj redj where #{req_idx} = redj.idx and dj.req_idx = redj.idx
